description: This file provides an API service module for interacting with accounting data on a backend server. It defines functions to list, create, retrieve, update, and delete accounting entries via HTTP requests, aligning with a RESTful API specification.

methods.name: listAccountingEntries({ skip = 0, limit = 10, transaction_type, category, account_name } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of accounting entries with optional filtering parameters.

methods.name: createAccountingEntry(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new accounting entry with the specified payload.

methods.name: getAccountingEntry(entryId)
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific accounting entry by its ID.

methods.name: updateAccountingEntry(entryId, payload)
methods.description: Updates an existing accounting entry identified by its ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteAccountingEntry(entryId)
methods.description: Deletes an accounting entry by its ID.

ctags.name: listAccountingEntries
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listAccountingEntries({ skip = 0, limit = 10, transaction_type, category, /
